component.name: addCartProduct
component.description: Add one or more products to a shopping cart.

component.name: updateCartProduct
component.description: Update one or more products in a shopping cart.

component.name: removeCartProduct
component.description: Remove one or more products from a shopping cart.

component.name: listCartProducts
component.description: Get a list of products in a shopping cart.

component.name: moveProductFromQuoteToCart
component.description: Move one or more products from the quote to the customer shopping cart.
